title: Open book
brief_description: Depicts the role of written communication in the life of the human race. Concentrates on the printed book with glimpses of advanced printing technology, libraries, indigenous publishing in developing countries, the paperback revolution, the range of human experience expressed on book covers, the effects of television on reading, literacy, etc
